fields.name: Текст
fields.default_value:
Additional terms:
1. Conditions of carriage: CMR, CMR insurance
2. The carrier is obliged to ask the customer all the necessary documents to complete this transportation before customs clearance.
3. Please provide information about trailer location in a timely and reliable manner.
4. Costs about which there was no information in advance are not paid!
The parties, carrying out this transportation, are governed by the CMR Convention and ЕЕА.
1. The carrier is financially responsible for the safety of the cargo and the quality of the transportation (chapter 4, article 17, paragraph 1 and
paragraph 3 of the CMR).
The carrier is obliged to inform the Customer every 24 hours about the progress of the movement of transport, and in particular, about the
start of movement, the border, the time of approach to the destination;
2. In the case of overload or underload of vehicles, delays in loading / unloading or customs clearance, or in case of other problems, the
Carrier must immediately inform the Customer;
3. Any additional expenses of the Carrier during transportation shall be compensated only if agreed with the Customer;
4. The driver is obliged to control the loading and placement of cargo on the semi-trailer / platform / curtain trailer during the entire loading
time, as well as the conformity of the loaded goods to the list in the CMR and other accompanying documents;
5. If problems arise during the delivery of the goods to the recipient, the Carrier immediately informs the Customer about this;
6. This Agreement is valid for one-time transportation and is valid only with the seal and signature of the parties. A scan copy with the seal
of the Customer and the Carrier is valid.
